testcase.name: testInputPlayRoundsSkipsBustedAndStandingPlayers
testcase.system-out:
======================================== *** ROUND 1 *** ========================================
=== Current hand === dennis: 18 lejla: 19 ethan: 15 ellis: 9
--- dennis turn --- Current hand: 18 dennis, do you want to hit? (yes/no): dennis draws: K♥ New hand: 28 dennis is over 21 and busted!
--- lejla turn --- Current hand: 19 lejla, do you want to hit? (yes/no): lejla stands (hand stays 19)
--- ethan turn --- Current hand: 15 ethan, do you want to hit? (yes/no): ethan draws: 2♥ New hand: 17
--- ellis turn --- Current hand: 9 ellis, do you want to hit? (yes/no): ellis draws: 3♥ New hand: 12
======================================== *** ROUND 2 *** ========================================
=== Current hand === dennis: 28 (Busted) lejla: 19 (Standing) ethan: 17 ellis: 12
--- ethan turn --- Current hand: 17 ethan, do you want to hit? (yes/no): ethan draws: 4♥ New hand: 21 ethan has exactly 21! ======================================== *** FINAL HANDS *** ======================================== dennis: 10♦, 8♣, K♥ = 28 (Busted) lejla: 10♥, 9♠ = 19 (Standing) ethan: 6♥, 9♠, 2♥, 4♥ = 21 ellis: 2♥, 7♠, 3♥ = 12 ======================================== ======================================== *** ethan wins with 21 points! *** ========================================
